fulltext: aff1ddc0bc8911e1a404080027e73ea259aeca28412944ea97f7b2580a41caec;2018-11-15T16:39:36Z;toolService;toolService:tool;U-Compare Cafetiere English Sentence Detector;The purpose of the tool is to detect sentence boundaries in English text. The tool is provided as a UIMA component, specifically as Java archive (jar) file, which can be incorporated within any UIMA workflow. However, it is particularly designed use in the U-Compare text mining platform (see separate META-SHARE record), since the types of annotations it produces are compliant with the U-Compare.;2013-02-15
name: befe24e9-ac43-5253-9e28-280af0176d0d
notes: The purpose of the tool is to detect sentence boundaries in English text. The tool is provided as a UIMA component, specifically as Java archive (jar) file, which can be incorporated within any UIMA workflow. However, it is particularly designed use in the U-Compare text mining platform (see separate META-SHARE record), since the types of annotations it produces are compliant with the U-Compare.
title: U-Compare Cafetiere English Sentence Detector
